alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Anyone who cares about science -- as well as anyone who cares about humanity, and good thinking -- should be appalled by such nonsense. But it has become the norm, and is presented with all the pompous piety for which we deride the worst of clerics."

- The privatisation of science, Colin Tudge, New Statesman, 2004/04/30.
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Nonsense Has Become the Norm
